Class RulesManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pasdam.regexren.controller.ErrorListenerManager
      • com.pasdam.regexren.controller.RulesManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RuleFactoryListener

    public class RulesManager
extends ErrorListenerManager
implements RuleFactoryListener
    Manager that keep a list of all renaming rules to apply
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    paco
